extracted_playbook.title: Identify Browser Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the current version of Google Chrome or other Chromium-based browsers installed on the system.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the browser version prior to 125.0.6422.60/.61?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Google Chrome
extracted_playbook.description: Update Google Chrome to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Other Chromium-based Browsers
extracted_playbook.description: Update other Chromium-based browsers such as Microsoft Edge, Brave, Opera, and Vivaldi when fixes become available.

affected_products: Google Chrome prior to version 125.0.6422.60/.61 for Windows and Mac
Google Chrome prior to version 125.0.6422.60 for Linux
